metadata.title: CVE-2023-2513 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A use-after-free vulnerability was found in the Linux kernel's ext4filesystem in the way it handled the extra inode size for extendedattributes. This flaw could allow a privileged local user to cause a systemcrash or other undefined behaviors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-2513` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-243-generic - 4.4.0-243.277
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-243-generic - 4.4.0-243.277
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-243-lowlatency - 4.4.0-243.277
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-197-generic - 4.15.0-197.208~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-197-generic - 4.15.0-197.208~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-197-lowlatency - 4.15.0-197.208~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1122-kvm - 4.4.0-1122.132
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1159-aws - 4.4.0-1159.174
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1143-aws - 4.15.0-1143.155~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1159-azure - 4.15.0-1159.174~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1138-gcp - 4.15.0-1138.154~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1108-oracle - 4.15.0-1108.119~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-243.277').
linux-hwe package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-197.208~16.04.1').
linux-kvm package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1122.132').
linux-aws package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1159.174').
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1143.155~16.04.1').
linux-azure package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1159.174~16.04.1').
linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-gcp package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1138.154~16.04.1').
linux-gke: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-oracle package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1108.119~16.04.1').
linux-oem: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-raspi2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-snapdragon: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
